fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport
membership:
Transatlantic Policy Network. 
European Internet Forum (on behalf of Zebra Technologies)
goals__remit: To promote transatlantic economic relations; to advise clients on EU and transatlantic economic policy issues.
relevant_communication: As a Senior Fellow of the German Marshall Fund, I regularly engage in writing about transatlantic and EU policy issues, and organize roundtables and other events (usually including employees of the EU institutions) to discuss these issues. I also separately participate in the European Internet Forum on behalf of Zebra Technologies (see below).
